Siapkan Bus Gratis, Polres Jaksel Siap Antar-Jemput Massa Unjuk Rasa
02 Nov 2019, 11:46 by Mei Amelia R
Jakarta - Polres Metro Jakarta Selatan bakal menyiapkan bus gratis untuk mengangkut massa yang akan berunjuk rasa. Polisi akan menjemput dan mengantar massa dari titik kumpul ke lokasi unjuk rasa hingga kembali ke titik kumpul setelah melakukan aksi.
Kapolres Metro Jakarta Selatan Kombes Bastoni Purnomo mengatakan program unggulannya yang disebut 'Aspira' atau Aspirasi Rakyat Jakarta Selatan' ini bukan untuk menekan kebebasan masyarakat yang hendak menyampaikan aspirasinya. Namun melalui programnya inilah, polisi mengakomodir massa yang akan melakukan unjuk rasa agar kegiatan berjalan tertib dan aman.
"Tujuannya agar penyampaian pendapat di muka umum itu berjalan tertib, lancar, tidak mengganggu ketertiban umum dan langsung disampaikan ke instansi terkait," kata Kombes Bastoni saat dihubungi detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
Bastoni mengatakan selama ini unjuk rasa yang berlangsung kerap menimbulkan kemacetan. Massa, menurutnya, tidak terarah karena kerap kali melakukan konvoi di jalan.
"Kan selama ini jumlah (pengunjuk rasa) banyak di jalan, bikin kemacetan ujungnya bentrok sama polisi. Kami cari win-win solution sehingga tetap aspirasi tersalurkan," ujarnya.
Secara teknis, massa tetap harus memohon Surat Tanda Terima Pemberitahuan (STTP) aksi ke polisi. Koordinator wajib menyampaikan tema aksi, jumlah massa, alat peraga, hingga lokasi aksi.

Prepare a Free Bus, South Jakarta Police are Ready to Mass Demonstration Mass Transfers
02 Nov 2019, 11:46 by Mei Amelia R
Jakarta - South Jakarta Metro Police will prepare a free bus to transport the masses who will protest. The police will pick up and escort the masses from the rally point to the demonstration location to return to the rally point after the action.
South Jakarta Metro Police Chief Commissioner Bastoni Purnomo said the superior program called 'Aspira' or the Aspirations of the People of South Jakarta 'was not to suppress the freedom of the people who wanted to express their aspirations. But through this program, the police accommodate the masses who will hold demonstrations so that the activities run orderly and safe.
"The goal is that the submission of opinions in public goes orderly, smoothly, does not interfere with public order and is directly conveyed to relevant agencies," said Commissioner Bastoni when contacted by AFP on Saturday (11/02/2019).
Bastoni said that protests that had taken place often caused traffic jams. The masses, according to him, were not directed because they often conducted convoys on the road.
"So far the number (of protesters) is on the road, causing traffic jams to clash with the police. We are looking for a win-win solution so that aspirations are channeled," he said.
Technically, the masses still have to request a Letter of Notification Receipt (STTP) of the action to the police. The coordinator must convey the theme of the action, the number of masses, props, to the location of the action.
